title: I just want to say
body:
How nice it is to have all the patch content released at the beginning of a patch for a change, as opposed to dragging it out over the whole patch.
thanks riot :)

its horrible when you see a new skin on the pbe, wait 2 weeks for the next patch, find out that your skin isn't released on patch day, wait another week and it still isn't out and when it does finally come out it a week later, its the day before the next patch.

so i just want to say how refreshing and awesome it is to have everything right at the beginning so everyone can enjoy it for the full duration of the patch.

keep it up :)

replies.body:
Thank you for the note Lord Sesshomaru.
Most of the credit goes to the release team :)
I'll pass this to them.
MM

Thanks man :) and thanks to them as well! 

we really appreciate the job you guys do ^^
I want too say....wheres the new {{champion:27}} skin at?
i just want to say why tf am i getting soo many afks
